Text: UK Tx Access Overviewfind attached a short overview of Ofgems recent consultation paper on transmission access and transmission losses under NETA Paul and I are discussing this with other Enron UK Power people in an internal meeting on Thursday afternoon Regards Nick

NETA Modificationsattached a summary of recently proposed NETA modifications The BSC Panel has recommended the Authority reject Mod P The other mods will be considered by the BSC Panel for the first time on May st a meeting which Paul and I will attend Proposed mods normally then go through a consultation and assessmentreporting phase before a decision is made Enron has an opinion on three of the mods P oppose P support with modified timing and P support option Elexon recommends P and P be treated as urgent which means the consultation and decision process will progress very rapidly Regards Nick
